example.parse: (NP-TMP (CP (WHPP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 施工) (NN 队伍)) (VP (PP-TMP (-NONE- *T*-1)) (ADVP (AD 就)) (VP (VV 要) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 开进) (NP-OBJ (NN 沙漠))))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 时候))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (NP-APP (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-TPC (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-SBJ (NN 年)) (VP (VV 近) (NP-OBJ (NN 花甲)))) (DEC 的))) (ADJP (JJ 总)) (NP (NN 工程师))) (NP-PN (NR 葭宏秋))) (VP (ADVP (AD 却)) (PP-PRP (P 因) (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 椎肩盘)) (VP (VV 突出)))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 寸步难行))))
